projects.name: SongwriterJS
projects.sContent: SongwriterJS is a static-site template that serves as a personal portfolio of a musician's songwriting credits and collaborations.

projects.name: TimeShifts
projects.sContent: TimeShifts is a web-application that generates work schedules taking into account employee shift-preferences.

projects.name: SquawkBox
projects.sContent: Squawkbox allows users to turn their iOS and Android devices into a communal jukebox by linking a users' Spotify account.
